Name: Blendy 2 Dolls Factory
About the game: Blendy 2 Dolls Factory - continuation of the first part of the game Blendy. Go through locations, finding keys and avoiding traps. Can you finally stop Blendy? Or will he and his accomplices be more cunning than you? Mysterious places, dangerous enemies, and more! Summer. 1999. You are Nikolai Umnikov-an ordinary resident of the Russian Federation. But after a recent event at the police station, you want to stop Blendy. But will you be able to stop it? It all depends on you and your perseverance. Solve the mystery of Blendy. More than 5 enemies that will not let you relax. Smart Blendy that will find and destroy you everywhere! Frightening atmosphere of the game. Real sound. Beautiful music. And many other things! What's new? Modified control of the character Updated interface
